loginForm.wrongEmailFormat: This is not a valid email format.

verificationTokenForm.createVerificationToken: Verification code has been sent to {{target}}. Please enter the code.

verificationTokenDialog.title: Don't receive the code
verificationTokenDialog.noReceiveCode: If you have not received the code, please try:
verificationTokenDialog.contentLine1: 1. Wait for a while as the email may be delayed.
verificationTokenDialog.contentLine2: 2. Check if it is in the junk mail.
verificationTokenDialog.contentLine3: 3. Go back and make sure your email address and password is correct.
